fun.connor.lighter.adapter

Class DelegatingAdaptorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • fun.connor.lighter.adapter.DelegatingAdaptorFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilteringTypeAdaptorFactory, TypeAdapterFactory

    public class DelegatingAdaptorFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements FilteringTypeAdaptorFactory
    Creates adapters based on a delegation chain. Useful when creating a single adaptor factory for multiple content types

    A delegate factory will be selected if its filtering predicate is sufficient for the type adaption requirement. If more than one delegate factory can fulfill the requirement, the factory added to the builder first is chosen.
